message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to purchase a unique product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to start the conversation at a price of $1200000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I really like the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand that you have a budget in mind, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1300000, but I'm not flexible beyond that. This is a unique product, and I think it's worth every penny.

I understand that the product is unique, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll propose $1150000. I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm not quite ready to meet you at $1150000. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to meet you at $1250000, which is a 10% discount from my initial offer. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your concession, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm starting to consider other options, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
